root.SourceConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: SELECT [DTS_ID],[MAIN_ID],cast(cast(PRODUCT_SN as int) as varchar(7)) as [PRODUCT_SN],[PRODUCT_NAME],[WEIGHT_GROSS],[WEIGHT_TARE],[WEIGHT],[COUNT],[TRADE_MODE],[UNITPRICE],[AMOUNT],[RATE],[FEE], CAST(FLOOR(AMOUNT/WEIGHT_GROSS) as varchar)+'_'+CAST((FLOOR(AMOUNT/WEIGHT_GROSS)+1) as varchar) as f_price_region FROM [HISTORY_SETTLE_DEAL_DETAIL] where WEIGHT_GROSS>0 and MAIN_ID in ( SELECT [MAIN_ID] FROM [HISTORY_SETTLE_DEAL_MAIN] where DEAL_TIME>=@startDate and DEAL_TIME<@endDate);
